sense.gloss: to take (a resource, e.g. time or money)
to come into view, to arrive
to come under (a contract, a tax)
to attend, to deal with, to handle
to have started to, to be on the verge of
to overlap (e.g. information in a manual), to cover
to be covered (e.g. with dust, a table-cloth, etc.)

sdata.j: その↑旅行↑↓りょこう↓は↑大体↑↓だいたい↓１０００ドルから２０００ドル|↑掛↑↓か↓かる|だろう。
sdata.e: The trip will cost anywhere between $1000 and $2000.

sdata.j: サム、これをやるのに↑何↑↓なに↓↑時間↑↓じかん↓も|↑掛↑↓か↓かる|ぞ。
sdata.e: Sam, this is gonna take you hours.

sdata.j: ↑見知↑↓みし↓らぬ↑人↑↓ひと↓に↑吠↑↓ほ↓え|↑掛↑↓か↓かる|のは↑多↑↓おお↓くの↑犬↑↓いぬ↓に↑共通↑↓きょうつう↓の↑習慣↑↓しゅうかん↓です。
sdata.e: Barking at strangers is a habit common to many dogs.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓が↑真面目↑↓まじめ↓に↑仕事↑↓しごと↓に↑取↑↓と↓り|↑掛↑↓か↓かる|のを↑今↑↓いま↓までみたことがない。
sdata.e: I've never seen him really get down to work.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓って↑手↑↓て↓の|↑掛↑↓か↓かる|↑人↑↓ひと↓だね。
sdata.e: You really have to manage him carefully.

sdata.j: その↑旅行↑↓りょこう↓は↑大体↑↓だいたい↓１０００ドルから２０００ドル|↑掛↑↓か↓かる|だろう。
sdata.e: The trip will cost anywhere between $1,000 and $2,000.

sdata.j: その↑旅行↑↓りょこう↓は↑大体↑↓だいたい↓１０００ドルから２０００ドル|↑掛↑↓か↓かる|だろう。
sdata.e: The trip will cost somewhere between $1,000 and $2,000.

sdata.j: それをやるのにいっぱい↑時間↑↓じかん↓が|↑掛↑↓か↓かる|だろう。
sdata.e: Doing that will take too much time.

sdata.j: ↑豚↑↓ぶた↓インフルエンザのことが↑気↑↓き↓に|↑掛↑↓か↓かる|んですか？
sdata.e: Are you concerned about swine flu?
